title: Healthy Weight Nutritional Supplement - Earth Animal
author: Name
cleaned_text: Remedies & Supplements Dog and cat supplements can help maintain excellent health throughout each stage of life. And, they can help your animals conquer different conditions along the way. In addition, dogs and cats that are fed homemade diets, over-processed cooked dry or canned foods, or raw food diets can lack the essential nutrients needed for optimal health. This is why Dr. Bob has formulated, and encourages adding, daily supplements.
